<<# Orga-internal list of Vertrauenspersonen for one event part.

    Required template variables:
    * part: The event part this list is for.
    * registrations: A sorted list filtered for those acting as Vertrauensperson during the event part.
        This is determined by a field specified in the config.
#>>
<<% extends "_lists.base.override.tex" %>>

<<% set title = "Orga-Liste Vertrauenspersonen " + (part.title|e if part else EVENT.title) %>>
<<% set num_columns = 4 + 2 * part.tracks|length %>>
<<% set portrait = true %>>

<<% block table_head %>>
    \head{Vorname} & \head{Nachname}
    & \head{Unterkunft}
    <<% for track in part.tracks %>>
        & \head{Kurs<<% if part.tracks|length > 1 %>> <<< track.shortname|e >>><<% endif %>>}
        & \head{Kursraum<<% if part.tracks|length > 1 %>> <<< track.shortname|e >>><<% endif %>>}
    <<% endfor %>>
     & \head{Handy}
<<% endblock %>>

<<% block table_body %>>
    <<% for registration in registrations %>>
        <<< registration.name.list_forename|e >>> &
        <<< registration.name.list_surname|e >>> &
        <<% with lodgement = registration.parts[part].lodgement -%>>
            <<% if lodgement -%>><<< lodgement.title|e >>><<%- endif %>>
        <<%- endwith %>> &
        <<% for track in part.tracks -%>>
            <<% with course = registration.tracks[track].course -%>>
                <<% if course -%>>
                    <<< course.nr >>>. <<< course.shortname[:20]|e >>> &
                    <<%- if track.course_room_field -%>>
                        <<< course.fields.get(track.course_room_field, "--")|e or "--" >>>
                    <<%- endif %>> &
                <<%- endif %>>
            <<%- endwith %>>
        <<%- endfor %>>
        <<< registration.mobile|phone|e >>> \\
        \hline
    <<% endfor %>>
<<% endblock %>>
